  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Art of Improvisation: 3 For All</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die kunst der Improvisation: 3 Für Alle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'art de l'improvisation : 3 Pour Tous</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arte do improvisation: 3 Para Tudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte di improvvisazione: 3 Per Tutti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τέχνη του αυτοσχεδιασμού: 3 Για όλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El arte de la improvisación: 3 Para Todos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK is there as Rafe Chase, Tim Orr and Stephen Kearin hit the stage without a script and turn audience suggestions into narrative stories that amaze and amuse. This Educator Guide addresses improvisation as a technique for developing thinking and language skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN ist dort als Rafe Verfolgung, schlagen Tim 
Orr und Stephen Kearin das Stadium ohne einen Index und machen 
Publikum Vorschläge zu erzählende Geschichten, die überraschen und 
unterhalten. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung adressiert Improvisation 
als Technik für das Entwickeln von von Denken und 
Sprachenfähigkeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE est là comme chasse de Rafe, Tim Orr
et Stephen Kearin frappent l'étape sans séquence type et 
transforment des suggestions d'assistances en histoires narratives qui
stupéfient et amusent. Ce guide d'éducateur adresse 
l'improvisation comme technique pour développer la pensée et les 
capacités linguistiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA está lá como a perseguição de Rafe, 
Tim Orr e Stephen Kearin batem o estágio sem um certificado e giram 
sugestões das audiências nas histórias narrativas que se espantam e
se divertem. Esta guia do educador dirige-se ao improvisation 
como uma técnica para desenvolver habilidades pensar e de língua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA è là come inseguimento di Rafe, Tim
Orr e Stephen Kearin colpiscono la fase senza uno scritto e 
trasformano nei suggerimenti dei pubblici le storia narrative che 
stupiscono e divertono. Questa guida dell'educatore richiama 
l'improvvisazione come tecnica per sviluppare le abilità di 
linguaggio e pensare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ είναι εκεί ως αυλάκωμα Rafe, Tim 
Orr και stephen Kearin χτυπούν το στάδιο χωρίς προτάσεις 
ακροατηρίων αρχείων εντολών και στροφής στις αφηγηματικές 
ιστορίες που καταπλήσσουν και διασκεδάζουν. Αυτός ο οδηγός 
εκπαιδευτικών εξετάζει τον αυτοσχεδιασμό ως τεχνική για τις 
δεξιότητες σκέψης και γλώσσας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA está allí como persecución de Rafe, 
Tim Orr y Stephen Kearin golpean la etapa sin una escritura y dan 
vuelta a sugerencias de las audiencias en las historias narrativas que
sorprenden y se divierten. Esta guía del educador trata la 
improvisación como técnica para desarrollar habilidades del 
pensamiento y de lenguaje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
